mapper.sql: id, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, res_name AS resName, type, url, code, parent_id AS parentId, listorder ,enable
mapper.select: SELECT res.code from resource res LEFT JOIN role_resource rm on res.id = rm.resource_id LEFT join role r on r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN admin_role ar on ar.role_id = r.id LEFT join admin ad on ar.admin_id = ad.id WHERE ad.id = #{adminId} and res.enable=1
SELECT res.* FROM resource res JOIN role_resource rm ON rm.resource_id = res.id JOIN role r ON r.id = rm.role_id WHERE r.id = #{roleId} and res.enable = 1

SELECT res.* from resource res LEFT JOIN role_resource rm on res.id = rm.resource_id LEFT join role r on r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN admin_role ar on ar.role_id = r.id LEFT join admin ad on ar.admin_id = ad.id WHERE ad.id = #{adminId} AND res.type = 0 and res.enable=1 ORDER BY res.create_time ASC
